entry.title: Wednesday: Wet flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to wet flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Wet flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
